attributes.action: Ensure that a firmer line legally speaking is taken against muslim extremist groups in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since 9/11 Muslim extremist groups have disproportionately taken over the political agender in this country, demands for this and that have been made that are alien to this countries way of life. The law is there to enforce against these groups but is not enforced with the full weight of the law. i call upon this government to ensure the maximum weight of the law is used against all muslim exremist groups in the UK and deportation for those that have come here from other countries to add to the extremist views of a hardcore minority
